title: Hextech Chest Glitch
body: So, I just decided to buy a chest because i had a spare key, anyway, i right click on it and hit open and then the chest animation thing disappears and the entire chest just disappears from my inventory as well? and my key... after that i relog and nothing new is in my inventory? rito plz halp{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body: It looks like you got the Super Galaxy Lamb icon from that chest. It can be a little confusing since the icon doesn't go into your loot page, it's automatically unlocked. You should be able to see it in your list of summoner icons!
